FuncDef: The display l2protocol-tunnel group-mac command displays Layer 2 protocol tunneling information.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays Layer 2 protocol tunneling information for all Layer 2 protocols.
-

Displays Layer 2 protocol tunneling information for a specified Layer 2 protocol.
The protocol as follows:
stplacpdtpgmrpgvrplldpvtpudldpagpcdpeoam3ahdldpmvrpmmrpe-lmisstp
One or up to all of the preceding Layer 2 protocols can be specified.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view Layer 2 protocol tunneling information after Layer 2 protocol tunneling is configured, run the display l2protocol-tunnel group-mac command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
